name: Anthropic Agent SDK
description: Build autonomous AI agents with Claude. Access Opus 4.5, Sonnet 4.5, and Haiku 4.5 models with built-in tools for file operations, web search, and custom MCP tools.
author: CO-LLAB

inputs.name: prompt
inputs.description: The prompt or task for the agent

inputs.name: tools
inputs.description: Tools the agent can use (Read, Write, Edit, Bash, Glob, Grep, WebFetch, WebSearch)

inputs.name: max_turns
inputs.description: Maximum conversation turns for the agent

inputs.name: system_prompt
inputs.description: Custom system prompt for the agent

secrets.label: Anthropic API Key
secrets.description: API key for accessing Claude models
